message: Bob, I'm pleased to offer you the exclusive opportunity to acquire this truly unique product. Given its exceptional value and potential, I'm proposing a starting price of $1,300,000. I believe this reflects a fair value considering the significant return you stand to gain.
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I'm looking to save some money on this deal. I'm willing to pay $1,200,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value and my budget.
Bob, I understand your desire to find a good deal.  I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,275,000. This offer reflects the true value of the product and leaves us both with a fair outcome.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $1,225,000 for the product. I believe this is a reasonable price considering the product's value and my budget.
